summary: All three requirements appear to be implemented across the relevant files. REQ-1 (washerDrainSecured YesNoField in plumbing/laundry), REQ-2 (carbonMonoxideTest YesNoField in safety/appliances), and REQ-3 (hotWaterArrivalTime text field in plumbing/water heater) are reflected in types.ts, defaults.ts, generateChecklistPdf.ts, and ChecklistFormPage.tsx. The file summaries confirm all three fields are present in the form UI and PDF output. No missing requirements or hallucinated features were identified.
